title: Hime-chan's Ribbon
resume: Erika, the princess of the Magic Kingdom has come to Earth in  order to find a human girl who looks just like her. That girl turns out  to be Himeko Nonohara, a tomboy's tomboy. Erika must give Himeko a  magical item she has created in order to prove her worth as a successor  to the crown. Himeko must test this item, a hair ribbon that allows her  to transform into any other person she sees, to see if it is worthy. The  series follows Himeko's adventures and her budding romance with Daichi,  the boy who discovers her secret.
